name: Island Racer
description: A casual racing game full of fun that can be played solo, against the computer, or online against another player. Island Racer features the unique ability to generate new original landscapes and tracks, offering infinite track combinations for a new experience with every race.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel multi core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 GPU DirectX: Version 7.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
